ygData.subject: Re: Best 1hs
ygData.msgSnippet: it is damage 8 delay 28, 1h blunt.  i just got one yesterday for 225pp, dunno maybe it was a little pricey but a bird in the hand, so i got it. it is found
ygData.messageBody:
it is damage 8 delay 28, 1h blunt. i just got one yesterday for 225pp,
dunno maybe it was a little pricey but a "bird in the hand," so i got it.
it is found in lower guk, on what mob i do not know. i think one sold at
last sunday's auction on mith marr in the 170-190 range.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 44 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Codo the Mysterious [mailto:codo@...]
> Sent: Sunday, June 13, 1999 6:31 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Best 1hs
>
>
> From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>
> What are the stats on a black enameled mace? Where can one
> acquire one (and
> at what level?)
>
> Lulen
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 11:24
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Best 1hs
>
>
> > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> > plan on maxing your 1h blunt because you will want a staff
> of writhing in
> > your primary hand. it means you can not use a demon claw,
> but a tomahawk
> or
> > better yet a black enameled mace in your second hand is an
> awesome combo.
> >
> > Shada Silverleaf, Level 43 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> >
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 9:34 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Best 1hs
> >
> >
> > From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
> >
> > >
> > > You outgrow a tomahawk fairly quickly. The spell effect
> on it goes up
> as
> > > you level, increasing STR, but also decreasing AGI .
> After a while,
> that
> > > AGI loss pretty much negates the magic skin(which doesn't
> go up in the
> > > amount of damage it can absorb), and keep in mind that
> while skinned,
> you
> > > can still be bashed and run stunned. Either one stops
> your songs cold,
> > and
> > > can get you killed at the wrong time.
> >
> > There's some interesting points in this note, some of which
> seems to be at
> > odds
> > with what other players have been telling me, particularly about the
> "magic
> > skin" effect not increasing in the amount of damage it
> soaks up as you get
> > higher in level, but since I have no experience, I won't
> argue with you.
> >
> > One thing to note though, the tomahawk's effect no longer
> stops or locks
> up
> > your
> > song, which is good news for bards.
> >
> > Something else you didn't mention which I think is
> important is that the
> > tomahawk is really a tank's weapon. The strength from the
> effect is nice,
> > but
> > you're really using that thing for the invulnerability, and
> if you're just
> a
> > hitter in your group and not the one taking most of the
> damage, then the
> > tomahawk would be much better off being a barbed leather
> whip or some
> other
> > more
> > efficient weapon.
> >
> > Jyzan
> >
> >
> >
